articles.author: Longjam Dineshwori
articles.title: COVID-19 patient’s body found infectious even 18 hours after death: Other latest discoveries - TheHealthSite
articles.description: Indian doctors have found that the presence of coronavirus in the nose mouth and throat of a patient’s body during autopsy 18 hours after death.
articles.content: Nearly a year has passed since the COVID-19 outbreak started in Chinas Wuhan city, but there are many unanswered questions about the novel virus. A few of the vaccine candidates are in the final stag… [+3850 chars]
